model.yamlContent:
resource.software.web.nginx_ansible:
  derived_from: "resource.software.web"
  properties:
    resource_config:
      default: {}
  interfaces:
    cloudify.interfaces.lifecycle:
      refresh:
        implementation: "sdx.resource_manager.operations.run_script"
        executor: "central_deployment_agent"
        inputs:
          script_type:
            type: "string"
            default: "ansible"
          script_path:
            type: "string"
            default: "ansible_nginx_operations/refresh.yml"
        max_retries: 0
      create:
        implementation: "sdx.resource_manager.operations.run_script"
        executor: "central_deployment_agent"
        inputs:
          package_url:
            type: "string"
            description: "请指定Nginx安装包下载路径"
            default: "https://nginx.org/packages/rhel/7/x86_64/RPMS/nginx-1.18.0-1.el7.ngx.x86_64.rpm"
            alias: "安装包下载路径"
          nginx_port:
            type: "integer"
            description: "请输入服务端口"
            default: 80
            alias: "服务端口"
          script_type:
            type: "string"
            default: "ansible"
          script_path:
            type: "string"
            default: "ansible_nginx_operations/create.yml"
        max_retries: 0
      start:
        implementation: "sdx.resource_manager.operations.run_script"
        executor: "central_deployment_agent"
        inputs:
          script_type:
            type: "string"
            default: "ansible"
          script_path:
            type: "string"
            default: "ansible_nginx_operations/start.yml"
        max_retries: 0
      stop:
        implementation: "sdx.resource_manager.operations.run_script"
        executor: "central_deployment_agent"
        inputs:
          script_type:
            type: "string"
            default: "ansible"
          script_path:
            type: "string"
            default: "ansible_nginx_operations/stop.yml"
        max_retries: 0

properties.description: 请指定Nginx安装包下载路径
